properties.areaDesc: Reno Beach to The Islands OH beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border; The Islands to Vermilion OH beyond 5 nm off shoreline to US-Canadian border; Detroit River Lt. to Maumee Bay OH to Reno Beach OH beyond 5NM offshoreline to US-Canadian border
properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued January 8 at 3:23AM EST until January 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Abnormally low water levels.

* WHERE...Portions of central and western Lake Erie.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST early this morning.

* IMPACTS...Below normal water levels will result in hazardous
navigating conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The water level at Toledo was 29 inches
above low water datum at 3 AM. The water level is expected to
decrease to just below the critical level mark of 23 inches
above low water datum until 6 AM.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING
